title: 关于CB Safeguard系统
author: +倒霉の忍者+
txt_content:
官方帖子地址：http://forums.bukkit.org/threads ... ning-policy.123435/
其中有一句：“This means that non-Bukkit API plugins will only break if a Minecraft update or a rename update has altered the code, instead of with every Minecraft update.”
官方对 non-Bukkit API plugins 的解释是：“To protect servers against incompatible plugins that have been developed using the unpredictable and volatile Minecraft code (which we’ll be referring to as “non-Bukkit API plugins” from this point onward)”

这意思难道是：
防止作弊或泄露玩家信息的模组或插件？
　或
正式向FORGE等Modloader宣战？
